name: Waterless Dance of the Shattered Maelstrom

levels.description: <$ba.root>Binds</> a faraway target and generates a tornado centered on it, inflicting <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed to nearby enemies. Enemies caught in the tornado receive <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as <@ba.vup>Arts damage</> and are dragged towards the center <@ba.vup>slightly</> once every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds. The target and nearby enemies are dragged towards this unit <@ba.vup>slightly</> after the skill duration
